title: To my dearest son Mileak
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and sons
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
abstract: 'I think you don't know what love is, until you have a baby'.
description: Even though Natasha Craig was pregnant at age 15, she was determined to have her child and embrace her new life as a mother. With the support of her family, she has been able to do so and doesn't regret her decision as she sets up her life for her and her son.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002099; Pitcha this : life stories from A.S.H.E (Shepparton) : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
